nodes.text: Laser scissors were a type of medical scissors used to cut and removed material during medical procedures. The Jedi Grand Master Luke Skywalker kept a pair in his medpac, which he used in 43 ABY to cut away the ruined leg of the Duros Jedi Qwallo Mode's jumpsuit, when he found Mode wounded in the Maw.
Laser scissors first appeared in the 2009 novel Fate of the Jedi: Abyss which was written by Troy Denning as part of the Fate of the Jedi series.
